content.value:
Fatima is an intercultural hostel with two locations, in the first house we have most of the private rooms and some dorms for our guests who want a place to chill; we have yoga classes and free art classes. In the second house, we have the most of the dorms where our guests can find a place to meet more people and have fun. We have a very well-known bar/restaurant where the guests can find many activities such as karaoke, playroom and dancing classes and share with other travelers and local people to feel like real Colombians.

Situated in Bogotá and with Luis Angel Arango Library reachable within 400 metres, Fatima Hostel Bogota provides concierge services, rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi throughout the property and a garden. Boasting a tour desk, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen and currency exchange for guests.
Guests at the hostel can enjoy a continental breakfast.
Popular points of interest near Fatima Hostel Bogota include Quevedo's Jet, Bolivar Square and Gold Museum.
Candelaria - Centro Historico is a great choice for travellers interested in museums, old town exploring and history.

description.description: Fatima Hostel Bogota is located in two beautiful colonial houses in the historical center of Bogota where the most important touristic attractions are. Travelers can find the most emblematic museums like Botero and Gold museum and many cultural and historical places like Monserrate, Plaza de Bolívar and others very close by.
